Electric field strength E is related to voltage U₁ and plate spacing d by E = U₁ / d.
Electric force on the particle is F = qE = -α * (U₁ / d).
Acceleration a in the y-direction is a = F / m = (-α * U₁) / (m * d).
Time t for particle to travel length L at constant velocity v₀ is t = L / v₀.
